name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Reunites with Luffy After Two Years
keyMoments.description: Law encounters Luffy for the first time since saving his life at Marineford two years ago. Luffy immediately recognizes and thanks him.
keyMoments.significance: This reunion sets up the alliance between Law and Luffy that becomes crucial for future arcs. It shows Law's importance to Luffy and begins their partnership.

keyMoments.title: Removes Smoker's Heart
keyMoments.description: Law uses his Ope Ope no Mi abilities to remove Vice Admiral Smoker's heart, defeating him and demonstrating his surgical powers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's overwhelming power and tactical superiority even against high-ranking Marines. Establishes him as a major player in the New World.

keyMoments.title: Heart Switch Between Smoker and Tashigi
keyMoments.description: Law swaps the hearts and personalities of Smoker and Tashigi, putting their minds in each other's bodies.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a new application of Law's powers - mind/personality swapping. This creates ongoing complications and shows his creativity with his Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.quote: I don't like these lame tear-jerking scenes.

abilities.description: Law can remove a person's heart using his Ope Ope no Mi, leaving them alive but vulnerable.
Law can swap the hearts/personalities of two people, putting their minds in each other's bodies.

relationships.description: Law saved Luffy at Marineford two years ago. They meet again on Punk Hazard, with Luffy expressing gratitude.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy and Law reunite on Punk Hazard, with Luffy thanking Law for saving him.

reveals.information: Law became a Shichibukai during the two-year time skip
Law can remove hearts and swap personalities between bodies

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Fuku Fuku no Mi Powers
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon reveals his Devil Fruit ability by creating warm clothing for the freezing children using leaves and stones.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Kin'emon's Devil Fruit powers in the anime. Shows his compassionate nature and provides practical help to those in need.

keyMoments.title: Reunited with His Legs
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon is finally reunited with his lower body after being separated, making him whole again.
keyMoments.significance: Kin'emon becoming whole makes him more effective as an ally. Also reveals that Law was responsible for cutting him apart.

abilities.description: Kin'emon can transform leaves or stones into clothing by placing them on someone's head and saying 'Poof'.

reveals.information: Kin'emon ate the Fuku Fuku no Mi and can create clothing from leaves and stones
Law was the one who cut Kin'emon into pieces

keyMoments.title: Heart Removed by Law
keyMoments.description: Smoker is defeated by Law who removes his heart using the Ope Ope no Mi, leaving him kneeling and vulnerable.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Smoker's vulnerability against Devil Fruit users with unique abilities. Demonstrates that even high-ranking Marines can be overwhelmed.

keyMoments.title: Mind Switched into Tashigi's Body
keyMoments.description: Law uses his powers to swap Smoker's mind/personality with Tashigi's, putting Smoker in Tashigi's body.
keyMoments.significance: Creates comedic and practical complications for Smoker. Shows his loss of control and agency at Law's hands.

keyMoments.title: Mind Switched into Smoker's Body
keyMoments.description: Law swaps Tashigi's mind/personality with Smoker's when she tries to attack him, putting her in Smoker's body.
keyMoments.significance: Creates ongoing complications as Tashigi must navigate being in her superior's body. Shows her helplessness against Law's abilities.

keyMoments.title: Thanks Law for Marineford Rescue
keyMoments.description: Luffy recognizes Law and immediately thanks him for saving his life at Marineford two years ago.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's gratitude and emotional maturity. Establishes the positive relationship between Luffy and Law that leads to their alliance.
keyMoments.quote: Tra-guy! You're the one who saved me at Marineford!

keyMoments.title: Revealed as the Master of Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Caesar Clown is confirmed to be the 'Master' behind the experiments on Punk Hazard and the one orchestrating events on the island.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Caesar as the primary antagonist of the Punk Hazard arc. His connection to Vegapunk and unethical experiments drive the conflict.

reveals.information: Caesar Clown is the Master orchestrating events on Punk Hazard
Caesar Clown is a former colleague of Dr. Vegapunk
